parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the Senate for Queensland 2013 (term began 1.7.2014).

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: Senate Legislative and General Purpose Standing: Economics: Legislation and References Committees from 1.7.14; Environment and Communications: Legislation Committee from 1.7.14 to 3.3.15.
Joint Statutory: Human Rights from 1.7.14; Public Works from 1.7.14 to 2.3.15 to 3.3.15 and from 4.3.15.
Joint Standing: Electoral Matters from 1.7.14; National Disability Insurance Scheme from 1.7.14 to 15.6.15.
Joint Select: Northern Australia from 1.7.14; Abbott Government's Budget Cuts from 17.7.14.
Senate Select: Wind Turbines from 27.11.14; Murray-Darling Basin Plan from 25.6.15.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament
quals.work.pre.parliament.para: Chief of Staff to Senator BTG Joyce 2010-13.
